title: 'Will & Grace' Star Sean Hayes Canceled After Posing With Kris & Kendall Jenner
text:
Sean Hayes is getting canceled by fans who vowed to turn the "Will & Grace" star off before the final season of his reboot even airs.

The comedy actor is facing major backlash after striking a pose with the KarJenner matriarch, Kris Jenner, and her model daughter, Kendall.

Related:

Sean Hayes Scores New Home With 'Just Jack' Cash

Jenner Sandwich!

Posting with the two "KUWTK" stars at a recent event, Hayes flashed that winning smile alongside the duo in the snap he shared on Thursday.

"Met these lovely ladies the other night and they couldn't have been sweeter," he captioned his pic with the mother/daughter combo.

While Hayes appears happy over meeting Kris and Kendall, "Will & Grace" fans aren't and they're threatening to turn the channel on the TV star.

Fans React:

Hayes, who's played the beloved Jack McFarland on the sitcom for 11 seasons, probably wasn't expecting the aggressive reactions from his social media followers.

Instantly, the actor's Instagram comments flooded with angry responses.

"Love u Sean, but 🤢🤮," wrote a fan. "Bye Sean. Bye Will & Grace last season," stated another. "Aww @seanhayes 😒👎 #U.N.F.O.L.L.O.W.E.D. and @bettemidler knows exactly why," wrote a third fan.

Many just wanted to shade the Jenner duo.

"I'm guessing you were sick at that time. The meds messing with your head. It's okay still ♥️ you. Remember don't touch them, use gloves," one person commented. "Eeeeek - stay away from those Kartrashians! They better not show up on W&G," warned another.

Final Season!

Fans are gearing up for a star-studded final season of "Will & Grace," which airs its first episode tonight.

So far, the guest stars include Demi Lovato, Billie Lourd and Olympian Gus Kenworthy.

"Will & Grace" airs on NBC at 9:30 PM PT.
description: Fans are turning on Sean Hayes.
